Freedom Is Life.name: Freedom Is Life
Freedom Is Life.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Freedom Is Life

Ribbons of glowing symbols flow out of you, linking you and your allies in a river of celestial light.

Daily        Divine
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you and any allies within 20 squares of you gain a +10 bonus to saving throws.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 152.
Freedom Is Life.flavor: Ribbons of glowing symbols flow out of you, linking you and your allies in a river of celestial light.
Freedom Is Life.range:
Personal

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you and any allies within 20 squares of you gain a +10 bonus to saving throws.
Freedom Is Life.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you and any allies within 20 squares of you gain a +10 bonus to saving throws.

Sheltering Wings.name: Sheltering Wings
Sheltering Wings.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Sheltering Wings

It is no shame to take refuge beneath the Platinum Dragon’s wings.

Daily        Divine, Healing
Minor Action      Melee 1

Effect: You regain hit points equal to your bloodied value. One ally adjacent to you also regains hit points equal to your bloodied value.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 152.
Sheltering Wings.flavor: It is no shame to take refuge beneath the Platinum Dragon’s wings.
Sheltering Wings.range:
Melee 1

Effect: You regain hit points equal to your bloodied value. One ally adjacent to you also regains hit points equal to your bloodied value.
Sheltering Wings.effect: You regain hit points equal to your bloodied value. One ally adjacent to you also regains hit points equal to your bloodied value.

Anthem of Progress.name: Anthem of Progress
Anthem of Progress.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Anthem of Progress

Erathis’s grim efficiency inspires your comrades to their necessary work.

Daily        Divine
Minor Action      Close burst 10

Target: You and each ally in the burst

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, each target can score a critical hit with any at-will attack on a roll of 16–20.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 152.
Anthem of Progress.flavor: Erathis’s grim efficiency inspires your comrades to their necessary work.
Anthem of Progress.range:
Close burst 10

Target: You and each ally in the burst

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, each target can score a critical hit with any at-will attack on a roll of 16–20.
Anthem of Progress.target: You and each ally in the burst
Anthem of Progress.effect: Until the end of the encounter, each target can score a critical hit with any at-will attack on a roll of 16–20.

Unerring Foreknowledge.name: Unerring Foreknowledge
Unerring Foreknowledge.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Unerring Foreknowledge

Hints of action and intention spread like gossamer trails that only you and your friends can perceive. Follow the trails and pierce the veils of time.

Daily        Divine
Minor Action      Ranged 10

Target: One ally

Effect: The target can take an extra standard action on his or her next turn.

Sustain Minor: Choose a different ally within range. That ally can take an extra standard action on his or her next turn. You cannot choose an ally as a target of this power more than once during an encounter.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 153.
Unerring Foreknowledge.flavor: Hints of action and intention spread like gossamer trails that only you and your friends can perceive. Follow the trails and pierce the veils of time.
Unerring Foreknowledge.range:
Ranged 10

Target: One ally

Effect: The target can take an extra standard action on his or her next turn.

Sustain Minor: Choose a different ally within range. That ally can take an extra standard action on his or her next turn. You cannot choose an ally as a target of this power more than once during an encounter.
Unerring Foreknowledge.effect: The target can take an extra standard action on his or her next turn.
Unerring Foreknowledge.sustainMinor: Choose a different ally within range. That ally can take an extra standard action on his or her next turn. You cannot choose an ally as a target of this power more than once during an encounter.

Test of Strength.name: Test of Strength
Test of Strength.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Test of Strength

Strong? Worthy? Kord will judge.

Daily        Divine
Minor Action      Melee 1

Target: You and one enemy

Effect: The targets simultaneously hit each other with melee basic attacks as free actions. If your attack deals more damage than the enemy’s, you can take a standard action as a free action. Any attack roll you make with this standard action has a +4 power bonus.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 153.
Test of Strength.range:
Melee 1

Target: You and one enemy

Effect: The targets simultaneously hit each other with melee basic attacks as free actions. If your attack deals more damage than the enemy’s, you can take a standard action as a free action. Any attack roll you make with this standard action has a +4 power bonus.
Test of Strength.effect: The targets simultaneously hit each other with melee basic attacks as free actions. If your attack deals more damage than the enemy’s, you can take a standard action as a free action. Any attack roll you make with this standard action has a +4 power bonus.

Wild Surge.name: Wild Surge
Wild Surge.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Wild Surge

Wild Melora blesses those who can kill for themselves.

Daily        Divine
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and any ally within 5 squares of you can score a critical hit with any daily attack power on a roll of 18–20.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 153.
Wild Surge.flavor: Wild Melora blesses those who can kill for themselves.
Wild Surge.range:
Personal

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and any ally within 5 squares of you can score a critical hit with any daily attack power on a roll of 18–20.
Wild Surge.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and any ally within 5 squares of you can score a critical hit with any daily attack power on a roll of 18–20.

Celestial Balance.name: Celestial Balance
Celestial Balance.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Celestial Balance

Against the mightiest enemies, there is one hope: Pelor endures.

Daily        Divine, Healing
Immediate Interrupt      Close burst 10

Trigger: A creature within 10 squares of you spends an action point

Target: You or one ally in the burst

Effect: The target can spend a healing surge and gains a +1 bonus to all defenses until the end of the encounter.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 153.
Celestial Balance.flavor: Against the mightiest enemies, there is one hope: Pelor endures.
Celestial Balance.range:
Close burst 10

Trigger: A creature within 10 squares of you spends an action point

Target: You or one ally in the burst

Effect: The target can spend a healing surge and gains a +1 bonus to all defenses until the end of the encounter.
Celestial Balance.trigger: A creature within 10 squares of you spends an action point
Celestial Balance.target: You or one ally in the burst
Celestial Balance.effect: The target can spend a healing surge and gains a +1 bonus to all defenses until the end of the encounter.

Death Is Nigh.name: Death Is Nigh
Death Is Nigh.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Death Is Nigh

The shadow of the queen’s wing falls over your fight.

Daily        Divine
Minor Action      Personal

Requirement: You or one of your allies must have failed a death saving throw during this encounter.

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and your allies gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 153.
Death Is Nigh.flavor: The shadow of the queen’s wing falls over your fight.
Death Is Nigh.range:
Personal

Requirement: You or one of your allies must have failed a death saving throw during this encounter.

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and your allies gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls.
Death Is Nigh.requirement: You or one of your allies must have failed a death saving throw during this encounter.
Death Is Nigh.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you and your allies gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

Horns of the Moon.name: Horns of the Moon
Horns of the Moon.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Horns of the Moon

The goddess blesses and curses, sometimes in the same breath.

Daily        Divine
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: At the start of each of your turns until the end of the encounter, as a free action you choose one ally and one enemy within your line of sight. The ally you choose gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls until the start of your next turn. The enemy you choose takes a –2 penalty to all defenses until the start of your next turn.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 153.
Horns of the Moon.flavor: The goddess blesses and curses, sometimes in the same breath.
Horns of the Moon.range:
Personal

Effect: At the start of each of your turns until the end of the encounter, as a free action you choose one ally and one enemy within your line of sight. The ally you choose gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls until the start of your next turn. The enemy you choose takes a –2 penalty to all defenses until the start of your next turn.
Horns of the Moon.effect: At the start of each of your turns until the end of the encounter, as a free action you choose one ally and one enemy within your line of sight. The ally you choose gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls until the start of your next turn. The enemy you choose takes a –2 penalty to all defenses until the start of your next turn.

Renewing Dawn.name: Renewing Dawn
Renewing Dawn.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Renewing Dawn

A glimpse of the true sun flashes above the battlefield, sending flares that lance down into your foes.

Daily        Healing, Radiant
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: When you or one of your allies spends a healing surge before the end of your next turn, this power deals radiant damage equal to one-half your level + your Charisma modifier to an enemy within 5 squares of the creature that spent the healing surge.

Sustain Minor: The effect persists.


Addition (2/10/2009)
In the Effect line, add “before the end of your next turn” after “When you or one of your allies spends a healing surge”.

Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 73.
Renewing Dawn.flavor: A glimpse of the true sun flashes above the battlefield, sending flares that lance down into your foes.
Renewing Dawn.range:
Personal

Effect: When you or one of your allies spends a healing surge before the end of your next turn, this power deals radiant damage equal to one-half your level + your Charisma modifier to an enemy within 5 squares of the creature that spent the healing surge.

Sustain Minor: The effect persists.
Renewing Dawn.effect: When you or one of your allies spends a healing surge before the end of your next turn, this power deals radiant damage equal to one-half your level + your Charisma modifier to an enemy within 5 squares of the creature that spent the healing surge.

Horn of Life.name: Horn of Life
Horn of Life.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Horn of Life

As a foretaste of the feasts in Chauntea’s dominion, her cornucopia spills its blessings upon you.

Daily        Healing
Minor Action      Close burst 20

Target: You or one ally in the burst

Effect: The target can spend a healing surge. At the start of each of your subsequent turns, until the end of the encounter, your ally with the fewest number of hit points above 0 gains regeneration 20 until the start of your next turn. The effect ends if you become unconscious.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 73.
Horn of Life.flavor: As a foretaste of the feasts in Chauntea’s dominion, her cornucopia spills its blessings upon you.
Horn of Life.range:
Close burst 20

Target: You or one ally in the burst

Effect: The target can spend a healing surge. At the start of each of your subsequent turns, until the end of the encounter, your ally with the fewest number of hit points above 0 gains regeneration 20 until the start of your next turn. The effect ends if you become unconscious.
Horn of Life.target: You or one ally in the burst
Horn of Life.effect: The target can spend a healing surge. At the start of each of your subsequent turns, until the end of the encounter, your ally with the fewest number of hit points above 0 gains regeneration 20 until the start of your next turn. The effect ends if you become unconscious.

High Arcana.name: High Arcana
High Arcana.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26High Arcana

Corellon’s mastery of the arcane allows you to choose between empowerment or defense for you and all your allies in the battle.

Daily        Divine
Minor Action      Close burst 10

Target: You and each ally in the burst

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, at the start of each target’s turn, the target can choose to gain either a +2 power bonus to implement attack rolls or a +4 bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will until the start of his or her next turn.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 152.
High Arcana.flavor: Corellon’s mastery of the arcane allows you to choose between empowerment or defense for you and all your allies in the battle.
High Arcana.range:
Close burst 10

Target: You and each ally in the burst

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, at the start of each target’s turn, the target can choose to gain either a +2 power bonus to implement attack rolls or a +4 bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will until the start of his or her next turn.
High Arcana.target: You and each ally in the burst
High Arcana.effect: Until the end of the encounter, at the start of each target’s turn, the target can choose to gain either a +2 power bonus to implement attack rolls or a +4 bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will until the start of his or her next turn.

True Death.name: True Death
True Death.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26True Death

Your gesture strips the undead of their tricks. Only death is left to them.

Daily        Healing
Minor Action      Close burst 10

Target: Each undead creature in the burst

Effect: You regain 2d20 hit points for each target. Each target loses all its resistances, the insubstantial quality, and the ability to recharge powers (save ends all).

Aftereffect: Target loses all its resistances, insubstantial abilities, and ability to recharge powers (save ends all).


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 73.
True Death.flavor: Your gesture strips the undead of their tricks. Only death is left to them.
True Death.range:
Close burst 10

Target: Each undead creature in the burst

Effect: You regain 2d20 hit points for each target. Each target loses all its resistances, the insubstantial quality, and the ability to recharge powers (save ends all).

Aftereffect: Target loses all its resistances, insubstantial abilities, and ability to recharge powers (save ends all).
True Death.target: Each undead creature in the burst
True Death.effect: You regain 2d20 hit points for each target. Each target loses all its resistances, the insubstantial quality, and the ability to recharge powers (save ends all).
True Death.aftereffect: Target loses all its resistances, insubstantial abilities, and ability to recharge powers (save ends all).

Forge of Creation.name: Forge of Creation
Forge of Creation.sourceRef: Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, Divine Power
Forge of Creation.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Forge of Creation

The fervor of Moradin’s ancient workshops of creation inspires you and your allies as you hammer upon your foes.

Daily        Healing
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you and any of your allies who hit with at least one attack regain their second wind if they have already used it in this encounter, regain one healing surge, and gain the use of another daily magic item power.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 73, Divine Power, page(s) 153.
Forge of Creation.flavor: The fervor of Moradin’s ancient workshops of creation inspires you and your allies as you hammer upon your foes.
Forge of Creation.range:
Personal

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you and any of your allies who hit with at least one attack regain their second wind if they have already used it in this encounter, regain one healing surge, and gain the use of another daily magic item power.
Forge of Creation.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you and any of your allies who hit with at least one attack regain their second wind if they have already used it in this encounter, regain one healing surge, and gain the use of another daily magic item power.

Supreme Knowledge.name: Supreme Knowledge
Supreme Knowledge.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Supreme Knowledge

In the divine view, to understand is to control.

Daily  
Immediate Interrupt      Personal

Trigger: You are hit by an attack against Fortitude, Reflex, or Will

Effect: Make a monster knowledge check that corresponds to the creature that is attacking you. If your check result exceeds the monster’s attack roll, the attack misses.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 73.
Supreme Knowledge.flavor: In the divine view, to understand is to control.
keywords:
Personal

Waxing Fortune.name: Waxing Fortune
Waxing Fortune.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Waxing Fortune

Your battle fortune swells like the moon waxes toward full.

Daily  
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, on each of your turns, you gain a bonus to attack rolls equal to the number of bloodied, conscious creatures that are within 10 squares of you at the start of your turn.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 73.
Waxing Fortune.flavor: Your battle fortune swells like the moon waxes toward full.

Personal

Sune's Censure.name: Sune's Censure
Sune's Censure.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Sune's Censure

Your power forces your enemies to share their weaknesses.

Daily  
Minor Action      Close burst 20

Targets: Two creatures in the burst

Effect: Choose two targets. Extend the vulnerabilities of one target to the other until the end of the encounter, so that they are both vulnerable until the end of the encounter, even if the original ability was only temporary. If neither targets is vulnerable to a damage type, then both targets gain vulnerable 5 all until the end of the encounter.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 73.
Sune's Censure.flavor: Your power forces your enemies to share their weaknesses.

Targets: Two creatures in the burst

If neither targets is vulnerable to a damage type, then both targets gain vulnerable 5 all until the end of the encounter.

Tempus's Glare.name: Tempus's Glare
Tempus's Glare.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Tempus's Glare

You call this battle to the attention of the Lord of Battles. His divine glare hastens the fall of the incompetent.

Daily  
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, every creature that attacks you and fails to hit takes damage equal to onehalf its level.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 73.
Tempus's Glare.flavor: You call this battle to the attention of the Lord of Battles. His divine glare hastens the fall of the incompetent.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, every creature that attacks you and fails to hit takes damage equal to onehalf its level.

Battle Judgement.name: Battle Judgement
Battle Judgement.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Battle Judgement

You have learned to emulate Torm’s decisive timing.

Daily        Healing
Free Action      Personal

Trigger: Your melee attack drops an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer

Effect: You regain hit points equal to the damage you dealt with the attack.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 73.
Battle Judgement.flavor: You have learned to emulate Torm’s decisive timing.
Battle Judgement.range:
Personal

Trigger: Your melee attack drops an enemy to 0 hit points or fewer

Divine Regeneration - Chosen.name: Divine Regeneration - Chosen
Divine Regeneration - Chosen.fullText:
Chosen Utility 26Divine Regeneration - Chosen

You ignite the divine spark that glows within you, unleashing a wave of regenerating energy for a short time.

Daily        Healing
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You gain regeneration equal to your highest ability score until the end of the encounter.


Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 73.
Divine Regeneration - Chosen.flavor: You ignite the divine spark that glows within you, unleashing a wave of regenerating energy for a short time.
Divine Regeneration - Chosen.range:
Personal

Effect: You gain regeneration equal to your highest ability score until the end of the encounter.
